distance_travel.midnightconfig.title: Distance Travel Config
distance_travel.midnightconfig.printTrac: Prints messages to chat every time stats related to tracking are updated during a tracking session.
distance_travel.midnightconfig.goToStats: Automatically prints the tracking results after a tracking session is completed.
distance_travel.midnightconfig.odoMode.t: Odometer Mode prints the distance from your current position to the previous position that was tracked each time tracking happens!
distance_travel.midnightconfig.text3: Setting this to a low value may impact performance but improve the speed of tracking.
distance_travel.midnightconfig.text4: It's best *not* to change this while a tracking session is active.
distance_travel.midnightconfig.timerInte: The interval in milliseconds at which the tracking timer will update the player's stats.
